items.summary: Replace the appâ€™s global theme CSS variables in `frontend/src/index.css` by updating the `:root` (light) and `.dark` (dark) blocks to use the exact OKLCH variable values provided by the user for all listed tokens, and add any missing custom tokens from the provided list so they are available globally.

Ensure the restored theme variables are used consistently by Tailwind utilities and existing component styles by keeping variable formats compatible with the Tailwind config (i.e., variables used via `oklch(var(--token))` must be defined as space-separated OKLCH channels rather than nested `oklch(...)` strings).
